name: Last Set Best Set
description: Brainstation Capstone Project where I built an web app that lets you log and track your workouts using React, Node, and Express.

name: Q & A
description: Q & A is a web based application with focus on an FAQ that would allow employees to feel connected and reduce anxiety associated with waiting for answers from HR enabling empowerment and saving company dollars.

name: BrainFlix
description: Video streaming platform using React for front-end development and Express for back-end development.

name: Band Site
description: Bandsite project for Web Development Bootcamp that is a dynamic website with API data handling, utilizing Vanilla JS, SASS, and HTML
